Package backend

Contains the behind the scenes classes utilized by PEMS.

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Config
    Global configuration class that allows easy access to the user settings stored in config.pems.
    PeripheralManager
    Global class used to detect and import evidence files located on peripheral devices (cameras, USB drives, etc.).
    StorageManager
    Global file management class used to handle all communication with and modification to the local file system.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    PeripheralManager.OSType
    Values used to represent the current operating system.
    StorageManager.CaseCreationResult
    Values representing the possible results of calling createCase.

Package backend Description

Contains the behind the scenes classes utilized by PEMS. Specifically:
  • A configuration class used to read and store user settings.
  • Classes used to read and import evidence files detected on peripheral devices.
  • Classes used to manage the cases and files stored by PEMS on the local device.
  • Classes for custom exceptions.
    Since:
    0.1
    Version:
    0.1
    Author:
    Jacob Jones, Andrew Rottier
